description:
1 BR apartment in Hamilton Heights conveniently located close to subway transportation (A, B, C ,D, 3 trains). 
1 queen bed, 1 air mattress, 1 sectional couch

Nearby: Brahman Yoga, Tsion Cafe & Bakery, Yankee Stadium, Starbucks, and Dunkin' Donuts, Harlem Public, 3 supermarkets, Duane Reade pharmacy, and multiple delis. 

Amentities: in-house washer and dryer, dish washer, and gym located in basement along with a yoga studio
name: 1 BR Upper Manhattan Abode
review: Bree is very attentive and a great communicator. She went out of her way to make sure her place was set up when I scheduled with her kind of last minute and was desperate to find a place for me and my friends to stay. Her apartment was easy to find, spacious and in fantastic condition.  If you are booking with Bree you are making a smart decision. (:
